sense.name: behave impudently
sense.examples: Bare breasted beauties parade around the stage, saucing the house.

sense.name: add zest to
sense.examples: Thin, tender ravioli was sauced in a delicate cream. Rigatoncini was sauced with a hearty lamb ragu. There, you will eat food that is often fried and richly sauced. The pasta is to be sauced and eaten immediately. The after-dinner coffee and coconut cake sauced with rumpope. Three were sauced with yogurt and a variety of aromatic spices.
